examPacks.name: TGAT English – Conversation & Speaking Pack 1
examPacks.description: Short dialogues and question–response items for TGAT English speaking/listening style practice.

questions.stem:
A: I'm really nervous about tomorrow's presentation.
B: ____
choices: I'm sure you'll do great. Want to practice together?
questions.explanation: ตอบ B เป็นการให้กำลังใจและเสนอความช่วยเหลือที่เหมาะสม

questions.stem:
A: Excuse me, is this seat taken?
B: ____
choices: No, go ahead. You can sit here.
Yes, I'm going to take a seat.
questions.explanation: ตอบ B เป็นการตอบรับให้นั่งได้

questions.stem:
A: I forgot my wallet at home. I can't pay for my lunch.
B: ____
choices: Don't worry, I'll pay for you this time.
You should buy a new wallet.
questions.explanation: ตอบ C เป็นการเสนอความช่วยเหลืออย่างสุภาพ

questions.stem:
A: How often do you study English?
B: ____
choices: At the library near my house.
Three times a week after dinner.
With my brother and my dog.
questions.explanation: ตอบ C ตอบความถี่ (how often) ได้ถูกต้อง

questions.stem:
A: I'm sorry I'm late. The bus broke down on the way.
B: ____
choices: That's okay. I'm glad you made it here safely.
questions.explanation: ตอบ A ยอมรับคำขอโทษและแสดงความเห็นใจ

questions.stem:
A: Do you mind helping me carry these boxes?
B: ____
choices: Yes, of course. Let me give you a hand.
questions.explanation: ตอบ B ตอบรับช่วยเหลือ

questions.stem:
A: The movie last night was so boring.
B: ____
choices: Really? I almost fell asleep too.
Yes, I already watched it twice.
questions.explanation: ตอบ A เห็นด้วยกับความเห็นที่ว่าหนังน่าเบื่อ

questions.stem:
A: I think I failed the English test.
B: ____
choices: Maybe, but you cooked very well.
Don't give up. You can learn from your mistakes.
questions.explanation: ตอบ C ให้กำลังใจและคำแนะนำที่ดี

questions.stem:
A: Could you turn down the music? I'm trying to study.
B: ____
questions.explanation: ตอบ A ตอบรับคำขอร้องให้เบาเสียงลง

questions.stem:
A: I'm going to study abroad next year.
B: ____
choices: Really? That sounds exciting! Where are you going?
Yes, I go abroad every day.
No, I don't have any plans.
You should stay at home always.
questions.explanation: ตอบ A แสดงความสนใจและถามต่อเนื่อง

questions.stem:
A: Hi, Mina. You look tired today.
B: Yeah, I slept only three hours last night.
A: ____
B: I know, but I had to finish my project.
choices: You should go to bed earlier tonight.
questions.explanation: ตอบ B ให้คำแนะนำเรื่องการนอนที่เหมาะสม

questions.stem:
A: Do you want to join our study group after school?
B: ____
A: Great! We'll meet in the library at 4 p.m.
choices: Sure, I'd love to. Thanks for inviting me.
questions.explanation: ตอบ C ตอบรับคำเชิญอย่างสุภาพ

questions.stem:
A: I'm thinking about buying a new laptop.
B: Really? ____
A: Mostly for studying and editing videos.
choices: What are you going to use it for?
How many colors do you have?
questions.explanation: ตอบ A ถามวัตถุประสงค์การใช้งาน สอดคล้องกับคำตอบ

questions.stem:
A: I lost my student ID card.
B: ____
A: Good idea. I'll go there this afternoon.
choices: You should tell your parents to buy a car.
You should ask the teacher for more homework.
You should check the lost and found office.
You should stop using your ID card.
questions.explanation: ตอบ C แนะนำให้ไปห้องของหาย

questions.stem:
A: Can you explain this grammar point to me?
B: ____
A: Thanks, that would be great.
choices: I'm not sure what my name is.
I'll try. Which part don't you understand?
questions.explanation: ตอบ C ตอบรับช่วยและถามรายละเอียด

questions.stem:
A: I missed the last bus to my house.
B: ____
A: Really? Thank you so much.
choices: I can give you a ride if you want.
Why don't you move to another country?
questions.explanation: ตอบ B เสนอช่วยไปส่ง

questions.stem:
A: I'm worried about my speaking skill.
B: ____
A: That's a good idea. I'll try it.
choices: Try recording yourself and listen to your pronunciation.
questions.explanation: ตอบ C ให้คำแนะนำฝึกพูด

questions.stem:
A: The cafeteria is so crowded today.
B: Yeah, I don't want to wait in line.
A: ____
B: Okay, that sounds good.
choices: Let's cook something together at your house.
questions.explanation: ตอบ A เสนอทางเลือกที่สมเหตุสมผล

questions.stem:
A: I'm not sure which university I should apply to.
B: ____
A: That's true. I'll search for more information.
choices: You should look at the programs and see what fits you.
You must follow your friend only.
questions.explanation: ตอบ C ให้คำแนะนำที่ดี

questions.stem:
A: I left my textbook at home. Can I borrow yours?
B: ____
A: Thanks! I'll be careful with it.
choices: Sure, but please return it after class.
Yes, I left it at home too.
questions.explanation: ตอบ A ให้ยืมพร้อมเงื่อนไข

examPacks.name: TGAT English – Vocabulary & Cloze Pack 1
examPacks.description: Vocabulary and preposition/cloze questions for TGAT English.

questions.stem: The teacher asked us to ____ our phones during the exam.
questions.explanation: turn off = ปิด (เครื่องใช้ไฟฟ้า)

questions.stem: Many students feel ____ before an important interview, but that is completely normal.
questions.explanation: nervous = ประหม่า/ตื่นเต้น

questions.stem: Online learning can be very useful ____ students who live far away from school.
questions.explanation: useful for = มีประโยชน์สำหรับ

questions.stem: My brother is very ____ ; he always finishes his homework on time and never misses a deadline.
questions.explanation: responsible = มีความรับผิดชอบ

questions.stem: If you want to improve your writing, you should read more articles ____ topics you are interested in.
questions.explanation: articles about = บทความเกี่ยวกับ

examPacks.name: TGAT English – Reading Comprehension Pack 1
examPacks.description: Short passages with comprehension questions for TGAT English practice.

questions.stem:
Read the passage and answer the question.

Many students use their phones to study English. They watch short videos, listen to podcasts, and read articles online. However, using a phone for learning also has some problems. Notifications from games or social media can easily distract learners. To study effectively, students should set clear goals and limit their screen time.

What is the main idea of the passage?
choices: Phones are bad and should not be used in class.
Phones can be useful for learning if used carefully.
Students should delete all games from their phones.
Watching videos is the only way to learn English.
questions.explanation: ใจความหลักคือ โทรศัพท์มีประโยชน์ถ้าใช้อย่างมีวินัย

questions.stem: According to the passage, which of the following is a problem when using phones to study?
choices: Teachers don't allow phones in school.
questions.explanation: ในบทความกล่าวว่า notifications สามารถทำให้เสียสมาธิได้

questions.stem: Which of the following is suggested as a way to study effectively?
choices: Watch as many lessons as possible in one day.
Keep all apps open while studying.
Turn off other apps while studying.
questions.explanation: บทความแนะนำให้ปิดแอปอื่นขณะเรียน

questions.stem: The word 'devices' in the last sentence refers to ____.
questions.explanation: devices หมายถึง phones ที่กล่าวถึงในบทความ

questions.stem: What can we infer from the passage?
choices: Phones are always more useful than books.
Students should never use phones to study.
The way students use phones is more important than the phones themselves.
Only adults can use phones wisely.
questions.explanation: สรุปได้ว่า วิธีการใช้สำคัญกว่าตัวอุปกรณ์

questions.stem:
Read the passage and answer the question.

Many high school students feel stressed when they prepare for university entrance exams. One way to reduce stress is to create a realistic study plan. Getting enough sleep and exercising are also important.

What is the passage mainly about?
choices: How to get the highest score on every exam.
Ways to reduce stress during exam preparation.
Why parents are always worried about exams.
The history of university entrance exams.
questions.explanation: เนื้อหาหลักคือวิธีลดความเครียดช่วงสอบ

questions.stem: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a way to reduce stress?
questions.explanation: การเล่นเกมทั้งคืนไม่ได้กล่าวถึงในบทความ

questions.stem: According to the passage, why is exercising helpful for students?
choices: It helps them avoid taking exams.
It increases the number of subjects.
questions.explanation: บทความบอกว่าการออกกำลังช่วยให้สมองผ่อนคลาย

questions.stem: What does the passage say about exam results?
choices: They completely define who students are.
They are not important at all.
They are important but not everything.
They are more important than health.
questions.explanation: บทความบอกว่าสอบสำคัญ แต่ไม่ได้กำหนดตัวตนทั้งหมด

questions.stem: Which sentence best describes the writer's opinion?
choices: Doing your best and learning from the experience is more important than getting a perfect score.
Students should never think about the future.
Parents should not care about their children's education.
Only smart students can enter university.
questions.explanation: ผู้เขียนเน้นว่าการทำเต็มที่และเรียนรู้สำคัญกว่าคะแนนสมบูรณ์แบบ

examPacks.name: A-Level English – Grammar & Usage Pack 1
examPacks.description: Grammar and sentence structure questions in A-Level / entrance exam style.

questions.stem: If I ____ more time, I would join the English club.
questions.explanation: Conditional Type 2: If + past simple, would + V1

questions.stem: She ____ to the library every Saturday, but today she is studying at home.
questions.explanation: ใช้ Present Simple + adverb of frequency สำหรับกิจวัตร

questions.stem: By the time we arrived, the movie ____ for twenty minutes.
questions.explanation: Past Perfect Continuous แสดงเหตุการณ์ที่เกิดก่อนและดำเนินอยู่

questions.stem: The teacher told us ____ our phones during the speaking test.
questions.explanation: tell + object + to + V1 (infinitive)

questions.stem: This is the student ____ project won the first prize.
questions.explanation: whose ใช้แสดงความเป็นเจ้าของ (student's project)

questions.stem: If you keep practicing every day, you ____ your speaking skills soon.
questions.explanation: Conditional Type 1: If + present, will + V1

questions.stem: Not only ____ late for class, but he also forgot his homework.
questions.explanation: Not only + auxiliary + subject (inversion)

questions.stem: I don't remember ____ this book before. Are you sure it's mine?
questions.explanation: remember + V-ing = จำได้ว่าเคยทำ

questions.stem: The new cafeteria is much ____ than the old one.
questions.explanation: Comparative: -er สำหรับคำพยางค์สั้น

questions.stem: The reason ____ she chose that university is its strong engineering program.
questions.explanation: the reason why = เหตุผลที่

examPacks.name: A-Level English – Vocabulary & Collocation Pack 1
examPacks.description: Vocabulary and collocation questions for A-Level / entrance exams.

questions.stem: The teacher asked the students to ____ their essays before submitting them.
questions.explanation: review = ทบทวน/ตรวจสอบ ก่อนส่ง

questions.stem: Our school will ____ a seminar about studying abroad next month.
questions.explanation: hold a seminar = จัดสัมมนา

questions.stem: The university is highly ____ for its research in medicine.
questions.explanation: highly respected = ได้รับความเคารพอย่างสูง

questions.stem: Many students find it hard to ____ a balance between studying and relaxing.
questions.explanation: keep a balance = รักษาสมดุล

questions.stem: Good time management is a key ____ of academic success.
questions.explanation: key element = องค์ประกอบสำคัญ
